title: FCFS Scheduling
subject: Operating Systems
theory:
Simplest Algo. The first one arriving gets the CPU. Non-preemptive. 
Problem: **Convoy Effect** - Short job stuck behind huge job (I/O bound waits for CPU bound).

examples.explanation: P2 and P3 wait too long.

real_world_use_cases.description: Background jobs (Backups) where response time doesn't matter.
